84f751b4-a735-4026-a4c2-96b915681d1e.title: How to build your own blog post editor
84f751b4-a735-4026-a4c2-96b915681d1e.author: Christopher Eadie

body.en-us:
Blog Builder V1


Hi everyone reading this. If you actually are then you have stumbled across a blog editor that i have build myself.
This is a massive achievement for me as I have only been in the web dev comunity for around 3 years

This is a service that is built entirly on node and is comprised of 3 elements the Blog UI which is what youre currently reading, the editor which manages all the posts and setting for making them live or saving a draft post as well as deleting them. Last of all is the API. Thats right this is all driven by an api. this allow me to abstract all the content away from the editor and the front end.
What i have achieve here is nothing short of awesome
